delete.title: Delete Workspace
delete.content: Deleting a workspace will also delete all images and categories in it. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure to continue?

delete.title: Delete Category
delete.content: Are you sure you want to delete this category and all its images? This action cannot be undone.

reset.title: Clear All Data
reset.content: This will delete all images and categories. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to proceed?
